titlepage.titleproper: Overview of the George H. Emerson papers
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives

Stanford, California

defitem.label: Encoded by:
defitem.item: Machine-readable finding aid derived from MARC record by David Sun.

titlepage.p: 2008 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Correspondence, reports, maps, photographs, and clippings, relating to the activities of the Russian Railway Service Corps, the political situation in Russia during the Russian Civil War, and the Czechoslovak Legion in Siberia.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], George H. Emerson papers, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1958.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the library catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Note
bioghist.p: Colonel, United States Army; commanding officer, Russian Railway Service Corps.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, reports, maps, photographs, and clippings, relating to the activities of the Russian Railway Service Corps, the political situation in Russia during the Russian Civil War, and the Czechoslovak Legion in Siberia.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.corpname: United States. Advisory Commission of Railway Experts to Russia.
United States. Army. American Expeditionary Forces.
controlaccess.subject: Railroads--Russia--Siberia.
Railroads--Soviet Union.
